bug.author: weifengpdx
bug.summary: Wrong User Guide description for H3 Input Features and Encoders section
bug.description:
Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. The User Guide description for the H3 Input Features and Encoders is using Date Feature's description, needs update. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to '...' Click on '....' Scroll down to '....' See error
Please provide code, yaml definition file and a sample of data in order to entirely reproduce the issue. Issues that are not reproducible will be ignored. Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: [e.g. iOS] Version [e.g. 22] Python version Ludwig version
Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment:
It's a minor error, only this part needs to be fixed <denchmark-code></denchmark-code>
The actual section explaining the encoders is correct.
Should be fixed, let me know if there are further errors.
